class_notes: --Course format: Meets once per week/A mix of in-person and online meetings. --ELSP 520 is designed to improve the academic and professional speaking performance of advanced and superior speakers of English (as determined by ELSP assessment). ELSP 520 provides an environment in which participants practice professional and academic speaking tasks with self-confidence. Specific skills developed include using precise, formal vocabulary; improving linguistic accuracy; using effective voice quality and vocal variety; employing organizational strategies to signal key ideas; effective explanations of visual information; and more. Participants meet as a group for discussions, presentations, and classroom activities, as well as individually for one-on-one consultations with the instructor in which they receive feedback on activities, and practice presentations, lectures, and discussions. Contact/Heather Boldt hboldt@emory.edu.
